alert.note: Alert for Cass; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 12:59AM CDT until July 15 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cass County in southeastern North Dakota... Southern Traill County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1258 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blanchard, or 33 miles northwest of Fargo, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kelso around 105 AM CDT. Hunter around 115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Grandin and Gardner. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 80 and 104. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
